meanings.definition: A pair of similar or identical items
meanings.sent1: I found a set of duplets in the drawer.
meanings.sent2: The store sells matching duplets of socks.
meanings.sent3: The duplets of keys were so alike, I couldn't tell them apart!
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like duplets of diamonds in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The farmer's market had a display of colorful duplets of fruits.

meanings.definition: Two musical notes played in the time of three of the same kind
meanings.sent1: The musician practiced playing duplets on the piano.
meanings.sent2: The song had a challenging section with duplets for the violin.
meanings.sent3: The duplets in the music made the melody sound unique.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like duplets of joy.
meanings.sent5: The sound of duplets in the orchestra added depth to the performance.
